TopicTitle: Jeb, Val, and.. The Third Wheel

Articles.Content:
So I started a mission today to capture a class D asteroid in Kerbin orbit with Jebediah, Valentina and the Third Wheel, engineer Lefty Kerman. (Yes it was randonly generated, so I made up the notion that Lefty Kerman only fixes parts on spacecraft with his left hand.)

Let's hope they make it back and not be carried off by the asteroid due to lack of fuel

The picture was shot on the ps4, and the way of transferring photos on there sucks. Had to do it on my phone, sorry for the bad quality.
